name: World of Warships Blitz War
about:

World of Warships Blitz is one of the top free-to-play navy and war games by Wargaming, based on the award-winning online multiplayer PC version. World of Warships Blitz plunges you into intense naval combat in the first half of the 20th century, where the Allies are battling Axis forces. This online multiplayer battleship game requires to battle in the high seas! Fully immerse yourself in a realistic battleship war simulator. Strategize, fight and shoot down naval vessels in either online or offline ship games. Build & upgrade your vessels to have the strongest fleet of World War warships!‚öîÔ∏è

name: Wolvesville - Werewolf Online
about:
Defend your village from the forces of evil or become a werewolf and hunt your friends!

Join the mystery game, fight for your team and find the liars among your ranks.

Wolvesville is a multiplayer game for up to 16 players. Each game has different teams such as villagers or werewolves all fighting to be the last team standing. Use special abilities to uncover the roles of other players and convince your fellow players to work with you.

Features:
‚óè Play online with your friends
‚óè Join games with players from all around the globe
‚óè Create and customize your own avatar
‚óè Send roses to your beloved ones
‚óè Join ranked games for serious competition
‚óè Unlock unique and limited items and shine in the game!
‚óè Discover a thriving Discord community with special events, extra loot and more!

üòçüòçüòç The ultimate game of lies and deception! üòçüòçüòç

Got any problems or suggestions? Talk to us on Discord at https://discord.gg/wolvesville. We love feedback!

Happy hunting! üê∫

name: Match Masters - PvP Match 3
about:
Match 3 Puzzle games - reinvented! Now with online PvP multiplayer!

üåü A NEW WAY TO PLAY MATCH 3 PUZZLE GAMES üåü
Play LIVE with friends OR against opponents from all over the world in a fun online PvP match 3 competition! Match Masters is free and has tons of new exciting ways to play matching games!

üéÆ üéÆ
In Match Masters, players take turns playing against each other on the same match 3 game board, so they must take into account not only the score they will get from their moves, but also the opportunities it could create for their opponent!

üöÄ üöÄ
Every blue star you match charges your Booster, while your opponent collects red circles.
Use your booster to gain score, tip the game in your favor, make satisfying comebacks and score huge combos!
Play with one of 20+ available boosters, and master their strategies and effects.

üèÜ üèÜ
Play Match Masters LIVE against friends or random opponents in knock-out tournaments and earn trophies to unlock new studios and compete against the best players in the leaderboards!
Reach the top in our changing events and win AMAZING rewards!
Become the master of all matching and puzzle games!

üë´ üë´
Match Masters is even more fun when you play with friends üòä
Connect with Facebook to challenge your friends and find out who the real Match Master is!

üëú üëú
Collect stickers and complete amazing sticker albums to receive HUGE prizes, trendy outfits and unique style packs that will dazzle your opponents!

üë§ üë§
Join our Official Group to meet, chat and share your game achievements with other Match Masters around the world!
Don‚Äôt miss out on your chance to win FREE prizes: http://facebook.com/matchmastersgame

Played thousands of levels in other tile matching games? It's time to Meet Your Match! Play puzzle games like never before!

name: Disney Heroes: Battle Mode
about:
It‚Äôs no-holds barred in this battle-packed strategy RPG game starring Disney and Pixar heroes from Wreck-It Ralph, Toy Story, The Lion King, Zootopia, Monsters, Inc., The Nightmare Before Christmas, The Incredibles, Tron: Legacy, and more. Battle your way through a dangerous digital world and save it from an evil virus with the help of your favorite Disney and Pixar heroes!

Wreck-It Ralph and Vanellope von Schweetz have found a Beta Key to unlock a mysterious new RPG game inside a massive digital City ‚Äì one plunged into chaos! They soon meet other heroes pulled into the City like Elastigirl from The Incredibles, all needing your help to team-up and battle the swarming enemy Creeps. It gets tougher as you go up against virus-corrupted versions of powerful Disney & Pixar characters themselves, like Chief Bogo, Elastigirl's husband Mr. Incredible and more.

Pull together your smartest, strongest teams from heroes like Aladdin, Elsa, Buzz Lightyear, Stitch, Mickey Mouse, Timon & Pumbaa, Hercules, Woody, Merlin, Captain Jack Sparrow and many other heroes! Equip them with powerful gear, and battle against incredible odds to save your fellow Disney & Pixar heroes. Fight back enemy Creeps, robots, ninjas, mages, monsters, and skeletons. The wicked virus is corrupting every pixel, turning even the heroes‚Äô own friends and family against them in this epic multiplayer RPG game.
Only YOU can win the day! No cape required.

‚Ä¢ Collect & battle with 100+ Disney & Pixar heroes, including characters from Frozen, The Incredibles, Robin Hood, Pirates of the Caribbean, Toy Story, Beauty and the Beast, Alice in Wonderland, plus so many more!
‚Ä¢ Team up for cooperative attack missions and special strategy campaigns in this multiplayer RPG competition.
‚Ä¢ Upgrade and equip your characters with epic abilities and gear.
‚Ä¢ Enter in the market to trade hero chips and badges.
‚Ä¢ Explore a new digital world and fight to save your fellow Disney & Pixar heroes!

Discover why EVE from Wall-E, Elsa from Frozen, Baymax from Big Hero 6, Moana, Scar from The Lion King, and Maleficent are teaming up in this battle-packed RPG starring some of your favorite Disney & Pixar heroes! Battle in the Arena and defeat all challengers! Survive in the arena using the best combat attacks. Combine speed, skills, strategy plus fighting experience in your team and make alliances with a suitable guild to win multiplayer battles in this RPG starring some of your favorite Disney & Pixar heroes.


You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game or by paying with real money.

This game contains advertising which will redirect you to a third-party site.

Visit our official site: https://www.disneyheroesgame.com/

Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: http://perblue.com/disneyheroes/terms/

name: Wargard: Realm of Conquest
about:
Wargard is a real-time action strategy card game with direct control over your troops. Be a war commander and lead ancient warriors to glory in competitive PvP battles.

‚öîÔ∏è About Wargard: Realm of Conquest
Legendary warriors are ready for epic clash! Choose from dozens of archers, swordsmen, spearmen, cavalry, war machines, special units and spells. Assemble a deck to have multiple battle tactics - base defense and strategic offense.

Fight enemies in competitive PvP! Deploy cards and manage mana carefully - apply strategy around your deck strengths. Destroy enemy towers to win, clash enemies to defend your towers, progress and earn more trophies!

Open generous rewards, unlock new cards, upgrade them to rise the power of your army and unlock your warriors' powerful abilities.

Control troops in real-time tactics: move your troops with a swipe, point to attack targets, defend the base, destroy enemy towers, capture the flag, tactically combine cards. Be an army commander and make well-timed decisions to win the battle! Set up your ultimate battle deck and dive into frantic conquest action!

Invite Friends to play together in competitive PvP! See who is better in real-time tower defense.

Complete battle quests to collect more rewards!

Special event modes bring variety to tower defense mechanics - play Capture the Flag or destroy enemy troops in Domination mode and collect 100 victory points to win!

Play on several tactical maps with different strategies for the battle. Green Valley map has enough space to move around with a variety of battle tactics. Desert River map challenges your strategic deck-building skills with a battlefield cut in two pieces. Rush through the map or gather army power to defend the base. You are the commander of realm.

‚Ä¢ Strategic Deck-building: gather an effective army.
‚Ä¢ Action Strategy: direct control battle tactics on your fingertips.
‚Ä¢ Divine Magic: use elemental spells and auras for battle domination.
‚Ä¢ Powerful Heroes: legendary ancient warriors with special abilities.
‚Ä¢ Challenging Maps: apply different tactics on 5 eye-catching maps.
‚Ä¢ Various Modes: build your deck to win in 5 unique modes.
‚Ä¢ World History: collect epic heroes from armies of ancient Rome, Greece, China Three Kingdoms, Celts, Huns, and African Legion.
‚Ä¢ Unique Art Style: Hand-crafted stylized 3D models and stunning animations.

Thank you for trying out ! Whether you like card battle or tower defense games, battle tactics, auto-battlers or build-and-battle games, we hope you will enjoy mastering the art of real-time war tactics and strategy within the competitive online realm of epic PvP battles!

If you like , please, leave a review and visit our social media pages:
